room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: Had a lot of fun with the Prison break room! Just when we thought we were free there was more to do! Loved the puzzles and how you really needed team work.

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: Very great experience! Tried the prison break escape room, with my coworkers! Had a blast! There are four different rooms, prison break is the hardest room! And we surpassed it as a team! This was my first escape room, and I had so much fun! I look forward to trying my next escape room here!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: Awesome we had blast. The employee's were friendly and helpful. JD the manager is awesome. And we beat it with one second on the clock.
